input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Endura Men's Pro Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Equipe R S9 Bib Shorts Jet Black - XS'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Endura Men's 6-Panel II Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille GT Bib Shorts'
  - Name='GOBIK Absolute 4.0 K10 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Gobik Men's Absolute Print Wilier Vittoria 2025 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Team Bib Short'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Soudal Quick-Step Competizione 2 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Free Aero Race 4 Bicycle Bibshort'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Aero-race Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Bib'
  - Name='Lapd Cycling Team Pedal Mafia Pro Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Pro Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's pro cycling bib short, closely matching the reference in product type, purpose, and performance orientation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe R S9 Bib Shorts Jet Black - XS
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end bib shorts from a renowned brand, intended for similar cycling performance and features; very relevant to the pro bibshort reference.
A well-known high-performance bib short similar in function and design to the reference product, suitable for long rides and durability.
A well-known high-performance bib short similar in function and design to the reference product, suitable for long rides and durability.
Duplicate entry of the same Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts, same rationale applies.
Duplicate entry of the same Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts, same rationale applies.
Cycling shorts but lack the bib feature implied in the reference, less relevant in silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille GT Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as other Assos Mille GT Bib Shorts, highly relevant pro bib short comparable to the reference.
Pro-level bib shorts designed for cycling, similar function and likely comparable materials and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Gobik Men's Absolute Print Wilier Vittoria 2025 Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cycling bib shorts with performance features, though print may imply minor stylistic difference, core function is aligned.
High performance men's bib shorts with a racing and team focus, closely matching reference in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Soudal Quick-Step Competizione 2 Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Top-tier pro team bib shorts designed for high performance cycling, very relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Free Aero Race 4 Bicycle Bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Aerodynamic and performance-focused men's bib shorts, closely aligned with the reference bibshort in purpose and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Aero-race Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another aerodynamically focused men's bib short, very close in product type and intended use to the reference.
Same brand and product line with 'Pro Bib' in the name, likely identical or extremely similar to the reference bibshort.
Same brand and product line but for women, similar construction and purpose though with gender-specific fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lapd Cycling Team Pedal Mafia Pro Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pro bibshort, likely similar high-performance bibshorts intended for competitive cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Related Pedal Mafia bib shorts but labeled 'Core' which may imply a different model line with possibly less advanced features than the 'Pro Delta' bibshorts.
